content: विज्ञा {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To know, be aware of; <ls>Bh. 3. 21.</ls> {@--2@} To learn, comprehend, understand. {@--3@} To ascertain, find out, learn from. {@--4@} To regard, know to be, consider as. {@--5@} To discern, discriminate, distinguish. {@--6@} To be familiar with. {@--7@} To become wise or learned; <ls>Ms. 4. 20.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (विज्ञापयति) {@--1@} To request, beg (<ab>opp.</ab> आज्ञापयति); सीता-आर्यपुत्र अस्ति मे विज्ञाप्यं; रामः-नन्वाज्ञापय <ls>U. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 20.</ls> {@--2@} To communicate, inform. {@--3@} To say, speak in general. {@--4@} To teach, instruct.
